xxl.core.io
Class HeadOfDataInput

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.HeadOfDataInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.DataInput
public class HeadOfDataInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.DataInput

Wraps a DataInput and returns only the first bytes of the DataInput. The methods that return a String are not supported.

Field Summary
protected  java.io.DataInput di
          The DataInput which is wrapped.
protected  int size
          Number of bytes to read.
 
Constructor Summary
HeadOfDataInput(java.io.DataInput di, int numberOfBytes)
          Constructs a new DataInput which only reads the data up to a certain point.

Field Detail

size

di

protected java.io.DataInput di

Constructor Detail

HeadOfDataInput

public HeadOfDataInput(java.io.DataInput di,
                       int numberOfBytes)
Constructs a new DataInput which only reads the data up to a certain point. If this point is reached, an EOFException is thrown.

Parameters:
di - DataInput to be wrapped.
numberOfBytes - Number of bytes to read.
